name: Certification Due
description: Sent to certification reviewers one week after a certification campaign starts and every seven days after that, until they sign off or the campaign ends.
subject: Reminder: Certification needs your attention
body:
Dear ${ownerName},

The certification "$certification.certificationGroups.get(0).name" is still open and needs to be completed.#if ($certification.expiration) This certification must be finished by $spTools.formatDate($certification.expiration,3,0).#{end} Click here to complete the certification.

Please note that failure to complete this certification by the due date may result in the removal of all access associated with this user.
